typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	as as string
}
source(output(
		id as integer '000',
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string,
		gender as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		zip as integer '000',
		Telephone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	limit: 100,
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss'],
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'decimal') ~> SourceMockarooPersons
